name: Overview

[{"id":"8c594cb1-5f2b-4797-ad9a-eaa0384beb2e","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function: func","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"aa3a3a3b-dddb-4236-905b-34372fc862b5","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"func","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function is a specialized normalization utility nested inside the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"getYPOint","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" method. Its primary purpose is to ensure that whatever object the analyzer is currently trying to resolve is first converted into a standard namespace string before being passed to the formal ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"resolve","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" engine. It provides polymorphic handling for ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Definition","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" objects, ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ScopeItem","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" objects, and raw strings, providing a consistent input for the resolution process.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"966672c6-239a-494d-8fd6-04a13b26de07","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Why this matters
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Throughout the static analysis process, variables and values are often represented by complex objects (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Definition","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" or ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ScopeItem","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") that carry metadata like line numbers or visibility flags. However, the core resolution logic (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"resolve","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") generally operates on raw namespace strings (e.g., ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"module.class.method","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"). This function acts as the "translator" or "extractor," stripping away the object wrappers when necessary to get to the underlying identifier that needs to be resolved.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"fd2dc140-6919-4313-8a3d-f3c354406986","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"How it Object Type:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It inspects the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"callee","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" argument.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9ccde2de-349b-4687-bf1a-cabaabc786fa","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Extract Namespace:","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[{"id":"e4b46a14-3dc2-462f-a8a0-0858c1fdb2bc","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"If the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"callee","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is a ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Definition","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" object, it calls ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"callee.get_ns()","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to retrieve its fully qualified name.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ffe1360a-656b-4bc2-9251-9769cced0f7c","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"If the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"callee","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is a ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ScopeItem","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" object, it similarly calls ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"callee.get_ns()","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"b79cdf76-e879-4e3d-99df-f1c7614728e5","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Resolve:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" Once it has a clean namespace string, it invokes the parent class's ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"self.resolve(callee, row)","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" method.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f515c361-6a75-45cf-8ebc-60b9947719b9","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Return:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It returns the resulting list of concrete target namespaces.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d57ede8a-714d-4f46-8280-6bc1dea5b6cd","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Example Scenario
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"If ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"getYPOint","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is processing a list containing a raw string and a Definition object: ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"["sys", Definition(my_var)]","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e58fd4de-4101-4971-8557-005277db87a6","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"For ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":""sys"","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", the function passes it directly to ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"resolve","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"820916c5-ba58-4b5d-906f-1239c57c5631","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"For ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Definition(my_var)","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", the function identifies it as a ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Definition","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" object, calls ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"get_ns()","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to get ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":""module.my_var"","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", and then passes that string to ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"resolve","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":". This ensures that the resolution logic is applied uniformly regardless of how the target was originally represented.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"758e9728-cddd-43ca-b4ca-414999c7f8eb","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
